# FastAPI
### Python 3.9.13
version manager: pyenv

### Swagger Auto Generated 
http://127.0.0.1:8000/docs


### ORM: sqlalchemyP

`run`
```
$ uvicorn main:app --reload
```

`pyenv commands`
```
pyenv versions: Show all installed Python versions.
pyenv install <version>: Install a specific version of Python.
pyenv uninstall <version>: Uninstall a specific version of Python.
pyenv global <version>: Set the global Python version to be used in all shells.
pyenv local <version>: Set the local Python version to be used in the current directory.
pyenv shell <version>: Set the shell-specific Python version to be used in the current shell session.
pyenv virtualenv <version> <env_name>: Create a new virtual environment with a specific Python version.
pyenv activate <env_name>: Activate a virtual environment.
pyenv deactivate: Deactivate the current virtual environment.
pyenv rehash: Update the shims directory after installing new executables.
pyenv which <command>: Show the full path to a command, including the version of Python it is associated with.
pyenv whence <command>: List all versions of Python that have a particular command installed.
```
